data.title: Why do I prefer PWAs, rather than .EXE?
data.description: PWAs are web applications that can be installed on any device with internet access, while the .EXE are applications that have to be compatible with the device in terms of hardware.

data.title: What offers Crypto? And why is important for the future?
data.description: PWAs are web applications that can be installed on any device with internet access, while the .EXE are applications that have to be compatible with the device in terms of hardware.
